name: alibaba.einvoice.income.token.return
description: 服务商回传税号token，用来勾选抵扣认证

requestParams.name: payee_name
requestParams.description: 销售方企业名称，success=true时必填

requestParams.name: payee_register_no
requestParams.description: 销售方纳税人识别号，success=true时必填

requestParams.name: success
requestParams.description: token是否获取成功，true=成功， false=失败
